title: Disco Inferno - 1992-1994 - The 5 EPs [Flac]
description:
Almost entirely out on their own, out of step with the times, Disco Inferno were widely under-appreciated during their (pre-internet) existence, they were probably the most ambitious and isolated band of the '90s with a steadily-expanding cult of devotees 
now discovering their often-brilliant 
catalog.

The 5 EPs was released in 2011 on One Little Indian Records in the UK and United States. All material included on the EPs is provided on the album in chronological order of release.
